name: Cinnamon Toast
description:
Cinnamon Toast is a top down survival game where the player controls Cinnamon, a mole armed with a flamethrower. They must burn away the roots at their cores and survive for as long as possible.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Fire flamethrower
